name: Night at the Casino
description:
You're a night guard at a casino but the dice have come alive to attack you! Fend them off with your dice stick or throwing cards! Walk into the shop with enough dice of high enough number to buy a different weapon.

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim and Attack
  • 1-6: Use Skills
  • 1: Dash (costs one 1 die)
  • 2: Shield (costs two 2 dice)
  • 3: Speed up (costs three 3 dice)
  • 4: Reroll shop (costs four 4 dice)
  • 5: Giant AOE explosion (costs five 5 dice)
  • 6: Heal 1 HP (costs six 6 dice)

Credits:

  • Art: n1fu
  • Music/Sound: Ezlo_the_hat
  • Programming: Zunawe
